text: The Gettysburgian is the monthly student magazine published for Gettysburg College in Gettysburg, Pennsylvania, United States. It was originally called the Weekly Gettysburgian and was first published in 1897. It provides national and campus news for the student population. == History == During the summer of 2019, the editorial staff of The Gettysburgian decided to switch from a weekly newspaper to a monthly magazine to encourage more students to read it. All articles are still published on The Gettysburgian website and is updated daily. == References == == External links == * Gettysburgian newspaper * Gettysburgian newspaper archives - Gettysburg College (1897-2010) * Illinois Digital Newspaper Collections: The Weekly Gettysburgian (1897-2004) Category:Student newspapers published in Pennsylvania Category:Gettysburg College Category:Education in Pennsylvania Category:Publications established in 1897
title: The Gettysburgian
